results.name: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists the number of parts in each of those partitions of n that have every part >=3.
comment: The ordering of the partitions is described in A176210.
link: J. S. Kimberley, Rows 3..39 of A177740 triangle, flattened.
xref: The length of the rows is given by A008483.
results.author: _Jason Kimberley_, May 13 2010
